two_factor_text1.message: Two-Factor Authentication significantly increases the security of your account. We highly recommend that you enable it.

two_factor_text2.message: Way to go! You care about your security as much as we do. Thank you for enabling Two-Factor Authentication!

two_factor_text_point1.message: Install an authenticator app on your mobile device. We suggest Google Authenticator.

two_factor_text_point2.message: Scan the QR code when prompted by your Authenticator.

two_factor_text_point3.message: In case your phone gets stolen or erased, you will need this code to link FALDAX with a new app.

two_factor_text_point4.message: Do not share the code with anyone. FALDAX will never ask you for this code.

subhead_security_settings.message: When set 'ON', changes to any security settings on your account will disable debits from your wallets for 24 hours. Additionally, you will be notified prior to changing any security settings and will have to confirm that you want to make those changes to ensure you don't accidently lock your wallet.

subhead_deactivate_account.message: Click on the button below to deactivate your account.

kyc_submit_text.message: All of your information has been received and will be reviewed by our Identity Verification team. You will receive a notification and an email within 24 hours informing you of our decision. If you don't hear anything after 24 hours, please visit the support page to let us know.

kyc_verified_text1.context: Identity verification kyc successfully verified subtext

simplex_text.message: FALDAX, in partnership with Simplex, brings the world's most prevalent crypto assets directly to you. Thank you for choosing FALDAX!

no_data_found_text.context: No Data Found text in table head

send_amount_note_text.message: Network Fee amount could change during the transaction depending on the market conditions.

wallet_generation_in_process.message: Your wallet is being generated and you will receive a notification when it is ready for use. If you do not receive a notification within 24 hours, or if you have any other concerns, please feel free to contact us

captcha_not_loaded_error_head.message: The automated human verification system encountered an error. Please refresh the page and try again. We apologize for any inconvenience.

captcha_not_loaded_error.message: Please try again after reloading the page.
captcha_not_loaded_error.context: Captcha is not loaded due to some network issue

kyc_popup_head.context: ID Verification Incomplete pop up head

kyc_popup_subtext.message: Before you can trade, you must complete the ID Verification Process. Please click the 'Get Verified' button below to begin.
kyc_popup_subtext.context: ID Verification Incomplete pop up subtext

kyc_popup_btn.context: ID Verification Incomplete pop up button for getting verified

illegal_popup_subtext1.message: Unfortunately, FALDAX does not offer trading services in your area at this time, but we are actively working to increase availability. Visit the world map on our home page to see where trading is considered legal in your area. If you are unable to trade that simply means we are working through the licensing process with the authorities in your area. Check back often or subscribe to our newsletter to be notified when services become available for you.

illegal_popup_subtext2.message: Thank you for your support and your patience.

panic_popup_subtext.message: Our systems have detected unwarranted and suspicious behavior which triggered our automatic lockout protocols. In order to ensure the safety and security of your assets and information, all assets system-wide are frozen and you will not be able to trade or move assets during this time. The balance you see in each of your wallets is secure and accurate. By default, the lockout goes into effect for 24 hours, but this time may vary depending upon what our security team finds and mitigates any known risks to you and all of our valued customers. Please follow our Twitter page and notifications we will send via text and email for the latest updates. Our primary concern is to always be the best possible stewards of your information and assets, and we are deeply sorry for any inconvenience. We thank you for your support and patience.
